attr.title: Flinthook
attr.desc: Live the life of space captain Flinthook! Armed with your mighty hookshot, your uncanny slow-motion powers and your trusty blasma pistol, plunder and fight your way through an infinite variety of randomly-assembled spaceships for treasure, loot and fame!
attr.inst: Install portfiles. Buy the game on Steam Copy Flinthook.exe and all surrounding files and folders to ports/flinthook/gamedata. Run the port!
attr.inst_md:
1. Install portfiles.
2. Buy the game on [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/401710/Flinthook/?curator_clanid=32938474)
3. Copy Flinthook.exe and all surrounding files to `ports/flinthook/gamedata`
4. Run the port!
